{Infra_IngressController} AC->>GOS: ExchangeCodeForTokens(Infra_EtcdCluster) GOS->>GT: POST https://oauth2.googleapis.com/token GT-->>GOS: {Infra_IngressController} GOS->>GV: ValidateAsync(Infra_EtcdCluster) GV-->>GOS: {Infra_WorkerNode} GOS-->>AC: GoogleTokenPayload AC->>UR: FindByGoogleProviderId(Infra_WorkerNode) UR->>DB: SELECT * FROM Users
WHERE GoogleProviderId = ? DB-->>UR: User found UR-->>AC: user AC->>JTG: GenerateAuthToken(Infra_LoadBalancer) JTG-->>AC: authToken AC-->>C: 200 OK + Set-Cookie: auth-token
